subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: It was a prosperous and historic night for the Giants’ defense, which hounded Eagles quarterback Donovan McNabb for 12 sacks, tying an N.F.L. record.
snippet: It was a prosperous and historic night for the Giants’ defense, which hounded Eagles quarterback Donovan McNabb for 12 sacks, tying an N.F.L. record.
